properties.name: security.externalAuthServerUrl
properties.description: External authorization url of Keycloak e.g. https://$host:$port/auth

properties.name: security.internalAuthServerUrl
properties.description: Internal authorization url of Keycloak e.g. https://$host:$port/auth

properties.name: security.realm
properties.description: Realm which service should use e.g. 'timate'

properties.name: security.clientId
properties.description: Client which service should use e.g. 'timate_core-service'
